title: Trimming, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Yellow trimming fragment in a design of lozenges in cut velvet separated by large X-shaped motifs. Borders in cut and uncut velvet.
